net.proteusframework.email

Class EmailTemplateProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.email.EmailTemplateProcessor

  • @Service(value="emailmanagement.EmailTemplateProcessor")
public class EmailTemplateProcessor
extends Object
    Processor for email templates.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • buildDomainModelContextForFreeMarker

        public com.i2rd.domainmodel.context.DefaultDomainModelContext buildDomainModelContextForFreeMarker(com.i2rd.domainmodel.supplier.DomainModelMediatorConfiguration config,
                                                                                          EmailTemplateContext templateContext)
        Convenience method for EmailConfigType implementations. Sets up a DefaultDomainModelContext and ...
        • Adds a FreeMarkerVariableResolver.
        • Provides backward compatibility for old, improper usage of VariableResolvers for value lookup (no FreeMarkerVariableResolver in this case).
        • Sets the principal if specified.
        • Sets the specified DomainModelMediatorConfiguration on the context.
        • Sets validation mode on the DomainModelContext if the EmailTemplateContext is in EmailTemplateContext.Mode.VALIDATION.
        Parameters:
        config - the basis for the returned context
        templateContext - the template context.
        Returns:
        a context with the given arguments and a FreeMarkerVariableResolver

      • process

        public net.proteusframework.data.mail.FileEntityMailDataHandler process(EmailTemplateContext context,
                                                               EmailTemplate template)
                                                                 throws EmailTemplateException,
                                                                        IllegalArgumentException
        Process the template and generate email data based on the specified context. The originators and recipients will be retrieved from the template by calling processOriginators(EmailTemplateContext, EmailTemplate) and processRecipients(EmailTemplateContext, EmailTemplate).
        Parameters:
        context - the template context.
        template - the email template used to generate the email data.
        Returns:
        the email data.
        Throws:
        EmailTemplateException - on error.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the template is missing a configuration.
        See Also:
        process(EmailTemplateContext, EmailTemplate, Multimap, Multimap)

      • process

        public net.proteusframework.data.mail.FileEntityMailDataHandler process(EmailTemplateContext context,
                                                               EmailTemplate template,
                                                               Multimap<net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailMessage.OriginatorType,net.proteusframework.core.mail.EmailAddress> originators,
                                                               Multimap<net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailMessage.DestinationType,net.proteusframework.core.mail.EmailAddress> recipients)
                                                                 throws EmailTemplateException,
                                                                        IllegalArgumentException
        Process the template and generate email data based on the specified context.

        You can use a MailDataHandler to create a MIME message directly with MailMessage or to create a StaticMailRequest for scheduling.

        Parameters:
        template - the template.
        context - the context.
        originators - the originators.
        recipients - the recipients.
        Returns:
        the mail data handler.
        Throws:
        EmailTemplateException - on error evaluating template.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the template is missing a configuration.

      • processExpressionString

        public String processExpressionString(EmailTemplate emailTemplate,
                             String propertyName,
                             String expressionString,
                             EmailTemplateContext context,
                             com.i2rd.expression.ExpressionEvaluator ee,
                             boolean externalizeLinks)
                               throws com.i2rd.expression.EvaluationException

        INTERNAL USE ONLY

        Processes a String as an expression.

        Parameters:
        expressionString - the String to be processed.
        externalizeLinks - whether to externalize links.
        emailTemplate - the source of the expression string.
        propertyName - the property name being processed. This is used for caching purposes so the string doesn't have to be parsed again.
        context - the template context.
        ee - the expression evaluator.
        Returns:
        the processed String
        Throws:
        com.i2rd.expression.EvaluationException - if evaluation fails.

      • processOriginators

        public Multimap<net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailMessage.OriginatorType,net.proteusframework.core.mail.EmailAddress> processOriginators(EmailTemplateContext context,
                                                                                                                                 EmailTemplate template)
                                                                                                                                   throws EmailTemplateException,
                                                                                                                                          IllegalArgumentException
        Process the email template and return the originators, if any, specified on the template. This will resolve any domain models referenced in the originator fields in the template.

        This is useful to call if you wish to modify / filter the recipients provided by the template.

        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        template - the template.
        Returns:
        the recipients.
        Throws:
        EmailTemplateException - on error.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the template is missing a configuration.

      • processRecipients

        public Multimap<net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailMessage.DestinationType,net.proteusframework.core.mail.EmailAddress> processRecipients(EmailTemplateContext context,
                                                                                                                                 EmailTemplate template)
                                                                                                                                   throws EmailTemplateException
        Process the email template and return the recipients, if any, specified on the template. This will resolve any domain models referenced in the recipient fields in the template.

        This is useful to call if you wish to modify / filter the recipients provided by the template.

        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        template - the template.
        Returns:
        the recipients.
        Throws:
        EmailTemplateException - on error.

      • schedule

        public void schedule(net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailDataHandler emailDataSource,
            @Nullable
            TimeUnit delayUnit,
            long delayAmount)
              throws IllegalArgumentException,
                     net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailDataHandlerException
        Convenience method to schedule an email for delivery that was created by processing an EmailTemplate.
        Parameters:
        emailDataSource - the email data source.
        delayUnit - the delay unit. Ignored if delayAmount is 0.
        delayAmount - the delay amount.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a email data source is used without recipients or a destination.
        net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailDataHandlerException - if an error occurs accessing the email data source.
        See Also:
        process(EmailTemplateContext, EmailTemplate), process(EmailTemplateContext, EmailTemplate)

        @Autowired
public void setScheduledRequestProcessor(com.i2rd.qrelay.scheduled.ScheduledRequestProcessor scheduledRequestProcessor)
        Set the scheduled request processor.
        Parameters:
        scheduledRequestProcessor - the scheduled request processor.
